items.title: Stripe deprecating recovery for SMB tier
items.detail: Stripe removing automatic retry logic on Starter plan. Thousands of SaaS companies losing built-in payment recovery.
items.action: Draft targeted outreach to Stripe Starter plan companies experiencing churn.

items.action: Monitor G2 reviews for Recurly recovery complaints, reach out to reviewers.
